861530.name: Insula: Bounty Royale
861530.description:
Insula: Bounty Royale is the first-ever arena shooter to give the player complete control over how they choose to engage their opponents. This provides a unique twist on the familiar game genre, battle royale. When a new match starts, each contestant has a bounty on their head. Outfitting yourself with advanced technology, you must hunt other players and eliminate them to collect their bounties. With each foe you eliminate, your own bounty will increase, making you a more desirable target for everyone else!




Custom-Built Your Way


Customize your anthropomorphic robot, a.k.a. Anthrobot, with a vast array of unique-looking armor. Build them big and beefy or light and nimble; every design choice is up to you! And of course, no look is complete without totally custom paint jobs, logos, and programmable battle taunts!




Player Bounties


You're not just fighting for bragging rights. Bounties are the heart and soul of Insula: Bounty Royale. Each opponent you face has a bounty on their head; collecting those bounties means creds in your pocket which you can use to upgrade your Anthrobot! Be mindful of your notoriety, though; the more you take, the more you're worth.

High-Octane Aerial Combat


Fight in 100% of your environment. You’re not limited to where you can reach on foot. Each Anthrobot is outfitted with a fully customizable flight rig. High-speed aerial maneuvers allow you to take full advantage of the arena's massive vertical play space. Play the ground game, or take to the skies; this is dog-fighting at its best!

Free to Play


Insula: Bounty Royale is completely free to play. Anything that is made available in the store can be earned by playing the game. This includes your Bounty Pass, which leads to more unlocks and amazing loot.
